venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
***Per the email just received from Tavern to Tavern, this race has been rescheduled for Sunday, September 4th... just bumped back a week due to Irene.  Although Labor Day weekend, I HOPE you can all still make it. 

If you are unable to attend with the new date, please update your RSVP.  Otherwise, hope to see everyone next week and stay safe wherever & whatever this storm ends up as. 

 

 

Everyone has their motivation to run!  For those who do it for the T-shirts, the free stuff, the post race parties, the finisher medal, or even the tax deduction for donations...this one has it all!

Join us for the Tavern to Tavern 5K on Sunday, August 28th in Cambridge. $25 registration plus $3 fee online (paper registration is available on the website) is to benefit Cambridge Rindge & Latin Track & Field & Cambridge Youth Hockey. 

The race begins at Tavern in the Square in Central Square and ends at Tavern in the Square at Porter Square with a post race party at the finish.

The race starts at 9am in Central Square.  We can meet at the T at 7am to get into Cambridge (where parking is NOT easy!).  We will coordinate meeting closer to the event.  They are providing a baggage check to transport bags from the start to the finish. (just watch what you bring & choose to leave unattended). 

To register & for additional race details: http://taverntotavern5k.com/index.php

T-Shirts to all pre-registered runners.

****Pint Glasses to all runners who register BEFORE June 21st!!!***** SO make sure you register early!  :)

Info from the site:

The course is a Fast + Flat Point to Point 5K through the heart of Cambridge. Interactive Course Map What is a Point to Point Race?
The Tavern to Tavern Course starts at 730 Mass Ave at the Tavern in the Square at Central Square and finishes at 1815 Mass Ave at the Tavern in the Square at Porter Square. The two Taverns are approximately 2 miles directly apart.

The course will take you through the heart of Cambridge - under the Cambridge Street Tunnel and through Harvard Square!

Baggage Check
Baggage check will be available at Central Square and will be transported to meet you at the finish in Porter Square.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Taver to Tavern 5K Road Race in Cambridge
